parameters.description: Name of the application function used to save the file (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: File description in the Save as type list

parameters.name: DocumentType
parameters.description: Type of document to save as defined in swDocumentTypes_e

title: ISldWorks.AddFileSaveAsItem2
description: Adds a file type to the SOLIDWORKS File > Save As dialog box.
signature:
System.Boolean AddFileSaveAsItem2( 
   System.Int32
Cookie
,
   System.String
MethodName
,
   System.String
Description
,
   System.String
Extension
,
   System.Int32
DocumentType
)

parameters.name: MethodName
parameters.description: Name of the application function used to save the file (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: File description in the Save as type list

parameters.name: DocumentType
parameters.description: Type of document to save as defined in swDocumentTypes_e

returns: True if the file type is added to the Save as type list, false if not
remarks:
Call this method in your add-in's ConnectToSW method.
Implement the function specified by MethodName with a string parameter that is the file name.
If your application is unloaded using the Add-In Manager, then you must remove any file types added with this method using
ISldWorks::RemoveFileSaveAsItem2
.
